titles.title: The voice of my Beloved, lo, He comes,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The voice of my Beloved, lo, He comes,
The voice of my Beloved, lo, He comes;
He leapeth o'er the mountains
And skippeth o'er the hills,
The voice of my Beloved, lo, He comes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The voice of my Beloved says to me,
The voice of my Beloved says to me:
Rise up, my love, my fair one
And come away with me,
The voice of my Beloved says to me.
